title: Identifying iodide-ion regulation of early-stage zinc nucleation and growth for high-rate anode-free zinc metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02784A, Paper
Wenchao Shi, Zhenjun Song, Wenwei Zhang, Sitian Lian, Fuzhi Huang, Qinyou An, Qi Li
An innovative approach of iodide ion-mediated regulation for the early-stage Zn nucleation and growth process is demonstrated to achieve highly reversible and high-rate anode-free aqueous Zn metal batteries.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
